message:
SYSTEM: Ontology-Methodology.pdf: Página 61
61
Data Models for Classification Schema
•
Path Enumeration Data Model is a 
recursive structure for hierarchy 
representations defined as a model 
which stores for each node the path 
(as a string) from the root to the 
node. This string is the 
concatenation of the nodes code in 
the path from the root to the node.
•
Adjacency  List is a recursive 
structure for hierarchy 
representations comprising a list of 
nodes with a linking column to their 
parent nodes
speaker: SYSTEM
